. China can help ease imbalances by raising the value of its currency, Olivier Blanchard said. China is moving in the right direction and focusing increasingly on domestic demand, but we think it can be done faster, he said. the suggestion of bankruptcy protection. California Treasurer Bill Lockyer told Reuters Insider Monday that states may not need the same freedom to declare bankruptcy as major companies because they have a guaranteed source of revenue. The major difference, of course, is that we're looking at sovereign governments that have the ability to enact a tax, and that's not the case of these private corporations that may have unfunded obligations that they can't deal with, he said.
